content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

(a) Using the data in the graph, identify the country that is the SECOND least corrupt.

(b) Using the data in the graph, describe a similarity or difference for Russia and Nigeria in terms of the Human Development Index (HDI) score or Corruption Perceptions Index (CPI) score.

(c) Describe one component of the Human Development Index.

(d) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about how perceived corruption relates to HDI.

e) Explain how the United Kingdom's regime type is related to the CPI score.

frqParts.text:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

(a) Using the data in the graph, identify the country that is the SECOND least corrupt.

(b) Using the data in the graph, describe a similarity or difference for Russia and Nigeria in terms of the Human Development Index (HDI) score or Corruption Perceptions Index (CPI) score.

(c) Describe one component of the Human Development Index.

(d) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about how perceived corruption relates to HDI.

e) Explain how the United Kingdom's regime type is related to the CPI score.
